Title: The Key
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (based on the series of graphic novels by), Tony Moore (based on the series of graphic novels by), Charlie Adlard (based on the series of graphic novels by), Channing Powell, Corey Reed
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Lauren Cohan, Danai Gurira
Plot: Hilltop's leadership faces a difficult dilemma after the arrival of unexpected visitors; Rick comes face to face with an adversary.
